name: QM_GEN_INFO
description: This table contains general information about the quality measure associated with registry data records.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the registry data record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: ACUITY_SYSTEM_ID
columns.description: This item stores the scoring system record ID from which the scores are calculated and stored, if applicable. This item is populated when the RDI record is created.

columns.name: ACUITY_SYSTEM_ID_ACUITY_SYSTEM_NAME
columns.description: The name of this HDA record.
